description: Flag indicating if its add only

Item_Identifier_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Item_Identifier_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Item_Identifier_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to item identifier type.

Universal_Item_Identifier_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Universal_Item_Identifier_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Universal_Item_Identifier_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Item_Identifier_Type_Data.description: The universal item identifier type mapping for the item identifier type.

validation.validation: Enter a Universal Item Identifier that is not mapped to an existing Item Identifier Type. [UIIT] is already in use.

Item_Identifier_Type_Data.description: Indicate whether the Item Identifier is UOM Specific. This is a derived value from its associated universal item identifier type, and the provided value will be ignored in put item identifier type operation.
